We're all back up and running with new COVID-19 procedures in place to keep everyone safe and having fun.


We're going to add a lot more info to the site soon, but first our resident web wizard is making some back end and infrastructure changes to keep the site running sweet.
In the mean time, get in touch to book!

View this post on Instagram

So changes have happened and here is a really quick little video of what to expect when you turn up for an adventure with us! 1. Instructors will meet you wearing a mask (if you have a mask we appreciate if you can wear one too) 2. Meeting and greeting- Handshakes and hugs are off the cards but we may elbow/fist bumpsüëä or learn the Shaka ü§ô 3. Wash your hands! If you've got hand sanitizer awesome if not we have some form of hand washing station. 4. Your equipment will be layed out for you based on the information you give on your medical forms and well instruct you on which one to take. 5. Then we'll start our adventures!! Please bare with us as we iron out the extra faff it's here to keep everyone safer üòÅ Lots of love Savage Adventures team! #weregoodtogo #COVID19 #supportlocal #visitwales #coasteering #canyoning #climbing #handwash #keepingyousafe
